data.name: DataXDay
data.description: DataXDay is the data centric conference created for developers and enthusiasts. Our vocation is to share ideas and visions around topics like data processing, streaming, data science, dataOps and security. For the second edition of DataXDay, data experts will be giving you insights on the latests …
